description: Introducing our range of Commercial Sofa Beds. Here you will find the most modern, simple, elegant, classic and sophisticated Sofa Beds available to the Commercial Furniture Industry. Whether you are the proud owner of a premium hotel, holiday park/resort, B&B, or even a hospice or nursing home, Sofa Beds are a perfect fit for you and a perfect way to transform your living space, maximising a whole room's capacity. Generally, these Sofa Beds can take 4-6 weeks to be made and shipped from purchase, however if you are working to tight deadlines, please give our sales office a call and let them know your requirements and they may be able to help you further! All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
